Wisdom: جَالِسْ أَهْلَ الْوَرَعِ وَالْحِكْمَةِ وَأَكْثِرْ مُنَاقَشَتَهُمْ فَإِنَّكَ إِنْ كُنْتَ جَاهِلًا عَلَّمُوكَ وَإِنْ‏ كُنْتَ عَالِماً ازْدَدْتَ عِلْماً
enWisdom: Sit in the company of the people of piety and wisdom and increase your discourse with them, for if you are ignorant they will enlighten you and if you are knowledgeable, you will increase your knowledge

Wisdom: جَالِسِ الْحُكَمَاءَ يَكْمُلْ عَقْلُكَ وَتَشْرُفْ نَفْسُكَ وَيَنْتَفِ عَنْكَ جَهْلُكَ
enWisdom: Sit in the company of the wise and your intelligence will be improved, you will ennoble yourself and your ignorance will be removed from you

Wisdom: صَاحِبِ الْحُكَمَاءَ وَجَالِسِ الْحُلَمَاءَ وَأَعْرِضْ عَنِ الدُّنْيَا تَسْكُنْ جَنَّةَ الْمَأْوَى
enWisdom: Accompany the wise, associate with the forbearing and turn away from this world you shall dwell in the Garden of the Abode

Wisdom: مُجَالَسَةُ الْحُكَمَاءِ حَيَاةُ الْعُقُولِ وَشِفَاءُ النُّفُوسِ
enWisdom: Agreement with companions prolongs the companionship; and showing courtesy in matters makes the means [of accomplishment] easy

Wisdom: جَالِسِ الْعُلَمَاءَ يَزْدَدْ عِلْمُكَ وَيَحْسُنْ أَدَبُكَ وَتَزْكُ نَفْسُكَ
enWisdom: Sit with the scholars and your knowledge will increase, your etiquette will improve and your soul will become purified

Wisdom: جَاوِرِ الْعُلَمَاءَ تَسْتَبْصِرْ
enWisdom: Be close to the scholars and you will perceive

Wisdom: خَيْرُ مَنْ صَاحَبْتَ ذَوُو الْعِلْمِ وَالْحِلْمِ
enWisdom: The best of those whom you can accompany are the people of knowledge and insight

Wisdom: عَجِبْتُ لِمَنْ يَرْغَبُ فِي التَّكَثُّرِ مِنَ الْأَصْحَابِ كَيْفَ لَا يَصْحَبُ الْعُلَمَاءَ الْأَلِبَّاءَ الْأَتْقِيَاءَ الَّذِينَ يَغْنَمُ فَضَائِلَهُمْ وَتَهْدِيهِ [تهذبه‏] عُلُومُهُمْ وَتُزَيِّنُهُ صُحْبَتُهُمْ
enWisdom: I am amazed at the one who seeks more companions why does he not accompany the wise, pious scholars from whose character he can benefit and from whose knowledge he can get guidance and whose company is an embellishment for him!

Wisdom: لِقَاءُ أَهْلِ الْمَعْرِفَةِ عِمَارَةُ الْقُلُوبِ وَمُسْتَفَادُ الْحِكْمَةِ
enWisdom: Meeting the people of cognizance is a means of strengthening the hearts and benefitting of wisdom

Wisdom: يَنْبَغِي لِلْعَاقِلِ أَنْ يُكْثِرَ مِنْ صُحْبَةِ الْعُلَمَاءِ وَالْأَبْرَارِ وَيَجْتَنِبَ مُقَارَنَةَ الْأَشْرَارِ وَالْفُجَّارِ
enWisdom: It behoves the intelligent person to increase his association with the scholars and the virtuous ones, and to keep away from the company of the evil and wicked ones

Wisdom: بِحُسْنِ الصُّحْبَةِ تَكْثُرُ الرِّفَاقُ
enWisdom: Through good companionship, camaraderie increases

Wisdom: فِي حُسْنِ الْمُصَاحَبَةِ يَرْغَبُ الرِّفَاقُ
enWisdom: It is in times of [financial] difficulty that the value of a friend’s generosity becomes apparent

Wisdom: مَنْ أَحْسَنَ الْمُصَاحَبَةَ كَثُرَ أَصْحَابُهُ
enWisdom: Whoever is concerned about you, then he is your [true] friend

Wisdom: اصْحَبْ تَخْتَبِرْ
enWisdom: Accompany [people] so that you may gauge [their true nature]

Wisdom: إِغْبَابُ الزِّيَارَةِ أَمَانٌ مِنَ الْمَلَالَةِ
enWisdom: Visiting [one’s brothers in faith] on a regular basis is protection from lethargy

Wisdom: أَحْسَنُ الشِّيَمِ إِكْرَامُ الْمُصَاحِبِ وَإِسْعَافُ الطَّالِبِ
enWisdom: It is better and more appropriate to associate with people of wisdom and intelligence

Wisdom: أَحَقُّ مَنْ أَطَعْتَهُ مَنْ أَمَرَكَ بِالتُّقَى وَنَهَاكَ عَنِ الْهَوَى
enWisdom: The most deserving of [obedience from] those whom you obey is the one who orders you to [maintain] piety and forbids you from [following] vain desires

Wisdom: إِذَا طَالَتِ الصُّحْبَةُ تَأَكَّدَتِ الْحُرْمَةُ
enWisdom: As the companionship prolongs, the [mutual] respect is affirmed

Wisdom: خَيْرُ مَنْ صَحِبْتَهُ مَنْ لَا يُحْوِجُكَ إِلَى حَاكِمٍ بَيْنَكَ وَبَيْنَهُ
enWisdom: The best person you can accompany is the one who does not compel you to seek adjudication between yourself and him

Wisdom: خَيْرُ مَنْ صَحِبْتَ مَنْ وَلَّهَكَ بِالْأُخْرَى وَزَهَّدَكَ فِي الدُّنْيَا وَأَعَانَكَ عَلَى طَاعَةِ الْمَوْلَى
enWisdom: The best companion is one who makes you infatuated with the Hereafter, urges you to renounce worldly pleasures and assists you in obeying your Lord

Wisdom: خَالِطُوا النَّاسَ بِأَلْسِنَتِكُمْ وَأَجْسَادِكُمْ وَزَايِلُوهُمْ بِقُلُوبِكُمْ وَأَعْمَالِكُمْ
enWisdom: Interact with people through your tongues and your bodies, but part from them with your hearts and your actions

Wisdom: جَالِسِ الْفُقَرَاءَ تَزْدَدْ شُكْراً
enWisdom: One who sits in the company of the poor increases in [his] gratitude

Wisdom: جَالِسِ الْحُلَمَاءَ تَزْدَدْ حِلْماً
enWisdom: Sit in the company of the forbearing and you will increase your forbearance

Wisdom: زَايِلُوا أَعْدَاءَ اللَّهِ وَوَاصِلُوا أَوْلِيَاءَ اللَّهِ
enWisdom: Keep away from the enemies of Allah and maintain ties with the friends of Allah

Wisdom: لِيَكُنْ آثَرَ النَّاسِ عِنْدَكَ [إِلَيْكَ‏] مَنْ أَهْدَى إِلَيْكَ عَيْبَكَ [مرشدك‏] وَأَعَانَكَ عَلَى نَفْسِكَ
enWisdom: Let the most preferred people in your eyes be the ones who guide you to your faults and help you to reform yourself

Wisdom: رُبَّ بَعِيدٍ أَقْرَبُ مِنْ كُلِّ قَرِيبٍ
enWisdom: Many a distant one is closer than every near one

Wisdom: فِي كُلِّ صُحْبَةٍ اخْتِيَارٌ
enWisdom: I am amazed at the one who seeks more companions why does he not accompany the wise, pious scholars from whose character he can benefit and from whose knowledge he can get guidance and whose company is an embellishment for him!

Wisdom: قَطِيعَةُ الْعَاقِلِ لَكَ بَعْدَ نَفَاذِ الْحِيلَةِ فِيكَ
enWisdom: The intelligent person [only] cuts off ties with you after failing to find any other way out

Wisdom: الْأَطْرَافُ مَجَالِسُ الْأَشْرَافِ
enWisdom: The peripheries are the sitting places of the honourable
